name: places/ChIJqcDtUQFZwokR7T_6xv-UI68
formattedAddress: 125 E 39th St, New York, NY 10016, USA
adrFormatAddress: 125 E 39th St, New York, NY 10016, USA

editorialSummary.text: Intimate outpost of a Japanese green tea specialist offering teas & brewing tips, plus cups to go.

originalText.text: They prepare high grade Japanese matcha right in front of you. They have lots of different options. I tried matcha latte and iced high grade matcha. Both were very good. The service is good and they have a punch card for frequent buyers.

text.text: They prepare high grade Japanese matcha right in front of you. They have lots of different options. I tried matcha latte and iced high grade matcha. Both were very good. The service is good and they have a punch card for frequent buyers.

originalText.text: I discovered this shop on Tiktok and I absolutely love it. I am from Montreal and the selection of matcha is very not great and I have searched everywhere. I have seen some review stating that UPS charges them duties but so far I have ordered two time and I have never been charged. This shop has very high quality matcha and they ship extremely fast. I love and will continue to buy from them as long as I am not charged duties.

originalText.text: Got in to matcha a few months ago and can confidently say I'm a convert from coffee. Ippodo was my first foray in to matcha and I'm glad I started there. My partner and I especially like the Horai 20g/Sayak 40g (same matcha) as usucha. We are eagerly awaiting some ummon to try as well. Rachel is fantastic to deal with from an informational as well as customer service perspective. Her attention to detail and ability to synthesize information, and critical think and apply was a breath of fresh air compared to other customer service experiences I've had across a range of domains. I cannot recommend the matcha or dealing with Rachel enough. Thanks Ippodo!

text.text: Got in to matcha a few months ago and can confidently say I'm a convert from coffee. Ippodo was my first foray in to matcha and I'm glad I started there. My partner and I especially like the Horai 20g/Sayak 40g (same matcha) as usucha. We are eagerly awaiting some ummon to try as well. Rachel is fantastic to deal with from an informational as well as customer service perspective. Her attention to detail and ability to synthesize information, and critical think and apply was a breath of fresh air compared to other customer service experiences I've had across a range of domains. I cannot recommend the matcha or dealing with Rachel enough. Thanks Ippodo!

originalText.text:
As a first time customer, the person at the counter explained the menu really well and the sort of flavor and textures we can expect from the tea l and preparation of certain drinks. My matcha drink was smooth and had a beautifully deep and vibrant green color. My partner's drink was smokey and interesting. Just like you'd sip a whiskey, this was a shipping tea that would have been great with a sweet.

Loved that you could watch them make everything in front of you

originalText.text:
Great quality matcha and very informative staff! For every drank we chose, the staff would explain the flavour an what we could expect from it. Their tea wares are also so very sleek, that I replaced my old sifter and got the chashaku (scoop) along with a Horai matcha.

I can’t wait for their tea tastings to be open again so I can learn more about the types of matcha they serve.
